channel.title: Shell on Jian Liew
channel.description: Recent content in Shell on Jian Liew

item.title: Basic commands
item.description: This blog post is under construction. This blog entry assumes that the reader has a basic understanding of using the command line and would like to know more. (More specifically using the Bash shell on Ubuntu) The man pages There are several ways in which users obtain help. One of the most well known way would be to use the man pages. However, these days most people do not use the man pages anymore.
